explanation: The outer loop used range(int(N/7)) which iterated N//7 times (often zero) instead of once per week; it should iterate N times. I changed the loop header to for j in range(N): so each of the N weeks is processed. This fix is a simple boundary correction similar to the loop-range fixes shown in the retrieved diffs.
fixed_code:
N = int(input())
l = list(map(int,input().split()))
lis = []
d = []
b = 0
for j in range(N):
  for k in l[7*b:7*(b+1)]:
      lis.append(k)
  d.append(sum(lis))
  lis.clear()
  b += 1
print(*d)
